name: Heavy Duty Demo
description:
Give heavy-duty machines a break! Ditch the practicality, and have some fun!

In this demo you will be able to drive a sporty forklift. There are two game modes and two maps available. Each player's best score and lap times are presented on a local scoreboard.

  • Score Jump - Launch the driver in the air and try to get as many points as you can. Try landing in the red container for bonus. 
  • Hot Lap - Get the best lap time possible.
  • Time Attack - Collect all checkpoints to get through a course as quickly as you can.

The game was made in Unreal Engine 4.

ControlsDriving

|W| or gamepad (RT) - acceleration

|S| or gamepad (LT) - break

|A| |D| or gamepad left thumbstick - steering 

General 

Mouse or gamepad right thumbstick - camera control

ESC or gamepad START - pause menu

Jump

Aim by driving the forklift, get some speed and press |SPACE| or gamepad (A) button to start angle selection, wait for optimal angle, press |SPACE| or gamepad (A) again, and hold for shoot strength selection. Release the key to shoot. 

While in air, you can steer with |A||D| keys, or gamepad left thumbstick. You can also jump once with |SPACE| or gamepad (A).
